NG0500:1: @#// rgya gar skad du / bun+d+ha pra na ta n+t+ra na ma /
NG0500:3: sangs rgyas ngo sprod pa'i rgyud /
NG0500:4: bcom ldan 'das stong pa chen po /
NG0500:5: ye shes kyi snying po ma 'gags par rang gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0500:6: 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na / chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang */
NG0500:7: rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshogs la /
NG0500:8: zhing khams sum rtseg gi snang ba /
NG0500:9: rag la rang chas su bstan pas /
NG0500:10: chos zad pa'i ngang du thim mo //
NG0500:11: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
NG0500:12: gsang ba rol ba'i dur khrod me 'od 'bar ba
NG0500:13: zhes bya ba / gti mug gi nam mkha' la /
NG0500:14: logs la nga rgyal gyi brag 'tsher ba /
NG0500:15: rtsa bar 'dod chags kyi chu 'khrug pa /
NG0500:16: bar na phrag dog gi rlung 'tshub pa /
NG0500:17: gseb na zhe sdang gi me 'bar ba /
NG0500:18: drag po'i gzhal yas khang de na /
NG0500:19: bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu stobs ldan chen po la /
NG0500:20: 'khor dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
NG0500:21: de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces zhus so //
NG0500:22: kye kye ston pa thugs rje can /
NG0500:23: sangs rgyas ye shes lus can gyis //
NG0500:24: rten dang lam dang gnad dang sgo dang */
NG0500:25: rang gi ngo bo gsung du gsol /
NG0500:26: zhes zhus ston pas bka' stsal pa //
NG0500:27: gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig / bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes lus can de /
NG0500:28: rten pa rang gi lus kyi byang khog stod 'di la @#//
NG0500:30: gnas pa ni snying gi nang na gnas so //
NG0500:31: lam ni snying gi nang nas mig tu rtsa dar
NG0500:32: dkar gyi skud pa 'dra ba tsam cig / mnyen
NG0500:33: pa khrag dang chu ser med pa gcig gi sbrel
NG0500:34: nas yod do // de ni ye shes kyi lam yin no //
NG0500:35: sgo ni sngon du gyur pa dang */
NG0500:36: lkog tu gyur pa gnyis so //
NG0500:37: mngon du gyur pa ni rang gi mig gnyis yin no //
NG0500:38: lkog tu gyur pa ni rna ba gnyis yin no //
NG0500:39: rang gi ngo bo dag pa chos kyi sku'i ngo bo stong par bzhugs so //
NG0500:40: stong pa ni zang thal du bzhugs so //
NG0500:41: ngo bo stong par bzhugs pa ni //
NG0500:42: rang gi ngo bo rig pa 'di nyid dngos po mtshan mar ma grub pa //
NG0500:43: ngo bo stong pa 'dug pa'i yin no //
NG0500:44: snying po gsal bar bzhugs pa ni //
NG0500:45: rig pa rang gi ngo bo ma 'gags par gsal ba ni sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yin no //
NG0500:46: ye shes zang thal du bzhugs pa ni / sangs
NG0500:47: rgyas snying gi dkyil na sha khrag gi lus kyis
NG0500:48: gtums kyang ma thub par / rang gi mig gi
NG0500:49: rnam par dag par mthong ba ma 'gags pa 'od
NG0500:51: 'di kho na ye shes zang thal gyi dgongs pa'o /
NG0500:55: ma rig mun sel sgron ma'i sku //
NG0500:56: sems kyi rten dang gnas dang sgo //
NG0500:57: lam dang rang gi ngo bo rnams //
NG0500:58: mngon par rim par gsung du gsol //
NG0500:60: yang ma rig mun sel gyis bka' stsal pa //
NG0500:61: gsang ba'i bdag po yang nyon cig / sems kyi
NG0500:62: rten ni rang rang gi lus po'i byang khog stod
NG0500:63: yin no // gnas ni glo ba'i nang na yod do //
NG0500:64: lam ni glo ba dang mgrin par rtsa gro sog gi spru gu tsam gyis sbrel nas yod do //
NG0500:65: de ni dbugs 'gyu ba'i sems kyi lam rtsa yin no //
NG0500:66: sgo ni 'dod ba'i sgo gsum ste /
NG0500:67: sna bug gnyis dang kha gsum yin no /
NG0500:68: 'dod pa'i shes pa de nas 'byung ngo *//
NG0500:69: sems rang gi ngo bo rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa //
NG0500:70: rnam rtog gi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'di rang yin no //
NG0500:71: rigs kyi bu sems las byung ba rnams ni 'khor ba'i rgyu yin no /
NG0500:73: de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa /
NG0500:74: e ma mgon po 'od dpag med //
NG0500:75: rang gi gzugs kyi phung po las //
NG0500:76: sems dang ye shes rnam par gnyis //
NG0500:78: tha ma gyes tshul ji ltar 'gyes //
NG0500:79: zhes zhus mgon por bka' stsal pa //
NG0500:80: gsang ba'i bdag po da ltar 'phrad tshul ni //
NG0500:81: rang gi snying gi dkyil na rig pa chos kyi sku'i ngo bo //
NG0500:82: stong pa 'dus ma byas par bzhugs so //
NG0500:83: rig pa rang gi ngo bo nyungs kar yang zhun lta bur bzhugs so //
NG0500:85: rig pa 'od kyi gong bu tshon lnga'i gru gu bsdogs pa lta bur gnas so //
NG0500:86: rig pa chos kyi sku ye shes lnga'i mtshan nyid du bzhugs so //
NG0500:87: rigs kyi bu de'i tshe ye shes rang gi snying nang nas 'thon nas //
NG0500:90: [(]8[)]@#// rtsa dar dkar skud pa tsam gyi nang na yar song nas //
NG0500:91: sgo rang gi mig gnyis na phar 'thon no //
NG0500:92: de'i dus su sems dang ye shes rgyab gyes so //
NG0500:93: de'i tshe dus ma 'gyur bar snang ba 'gyur bar snang nas //
NG0500:94: sa rdo ri brag rtsi shing nags tshal thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa /
NG0500:97: rang bzhin gyis bkrag nyam nga ba /
NG0500:98: phyi'i rgya mtsho mthong ba bzhin /
NG0500:99: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brdal nas 'ong bas /
NG0500:100: de la ma 'jigs shig / rig pa 'dzin pa
NG0500:101: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa zhag lngar 'char ro
NG0500:102: // thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba rang
NG0500:103: gi rang gdang chos dbyings dag pa'i ngang du thim
NG0500:104: // mo // dag pa'i snang bar shes pas sangs rgyas so //
NG0500:105: khams gsum gyi sems can gyis ye shes kyi snang ba yang nas yang du mthong kyang */
NG0500:106: ngo ma shes pas na 'khor bar 'khyams so //
NG0500:107: gsang ba'i bdag po dbugs chad pa dang */
NG0500:108: ye shes kyi snang ba shar dus mnyam mo //
NG0500:109: yul gyi blo rdol ba yin pas /
NG0500:110: yul thams cad ye shes kyi snang bar shar nas 'ong ngo *//
NG0500:111: chos nyid dag pa zhag lngar shar ba de rang gi rig pa'i gdangs sam rang 'od yin no //
NG0500:112: de ngo shes par gyis shig / gsang ba'i bdag
NG0500:113: po mi dbul pos nor bu rin po che btsal
NG0500:114: kyang mi rnyed na dran pas lta ci smos /
NG0500:115: rigs kyi bu rang dbugs chad pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa /
NG0500:116: me long gi ngos la nyi ma shar ba lta bu dus gcig la 'char ro //
NG0500:117: de'i dus su 'od mthing ka mthong ba'i tshe na //
NG0500:118: 'di ka rag gi rig pa ngo bo stong pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su shes pas //
NG0500:119: rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NG0500:120: 'od ser po mthong ba'i tshe / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su shes pas /
NG0500:121: rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NG0500:123: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su ngo shes pas
NG0500:124: / snang ba mtha' yas yab yum 'khor dang bcas
NG0500:127: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su ngo shes pas /
NG0500:128: don yod grub pa yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NG0500:129: gsang ba'i bdag po dag snang shar bas //
NG0500:131: de dran pas sangs rgyas thob bo //
NG0500:132: 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa'i mis bza' btung mi bsam //
NG0500:133: zas dran pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NG0500:134: bla / zhes dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis gsungs so
NG0500:135: // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'dus ma byas yin la /
NG0500:136: byas pa'i chos kyis 'grub na 'dus byas su 'gyur ro //
NG0500:137: bde gshegs ye shes lus can de //
NG0500:138: rang las byung zhing rang gis shes //
NG0500:139: rang ni de nyid du grol lo / mthong byed kyis mthong @#//
NG0500:140: nas shes byed kyi shes so //
NG0500:142: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NG0500:143: 'byung ba dang snyigs 'byed pa'i dus su //
NG0500:144: rang gi snying gi dkyil nas ye shes gnas steg pas //
NG0500:145: gdangs phyir nas rang gi rig pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du yod pas /
NG0500:146: rang gi snying nang nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mthing kha'i rang bzhin du gnas so //
NG0500:147: me long lta bu'i ye shes kha dog dkar por yod do //
NG0500:148: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kha dog ser por gnas so //
NG0500:149: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kha dog dmar por gnas so //
NG0500:150: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kha dog ljang khur gnas pa'o //
NG0500:151: de ltar rig pa ye shes lnga'i kha dog tu gnas pas /
NG0500:152: rang gi snying nang na 'od kha dog lnga me re re yod do //
NG0500:153: sems ni glo ba'i nang na yod do //
NG0500:154: glo ba dwangs snying ni rtsa sog ma'i sbu gu tsam gyis sbrel nas yod do //
NG0500:155: sems glo ba'i nang nas 'thon te /
NG0500:156: rtsa sog ma'i sbu gu tsam de'i nang na yar dbugs 'gyus pas //
NG0500:157: snying nang na yar sku gsum ye shes lnga bzhugs pa dang 'phrad do //
NG0500:158: rang gi snying gi dkyil du rig pa dbugs kyi rta dang 'phrad pas /
NG0500:159: dbugs med pa'i 'gyu ba zhes bya'o //
NG0500:160: tha ma rgyab gyes pa'i tshul ni / rang 'chi
NG0500:161: ba'i dus su sems glo ba'i nang nas 'thon te
NG0500:162: / lam gro sog gi sbu gu tsam sna bug gnyis //
NG0500:163: kha dang gsum nas ha zer te dbugs par 'gyu'o //
NG0500:164: tha ma hu zer nas nang du 'dren no //
NG0500:165: gsang ba'i bdag po / srid pa'i ri bo las rgal ba'i dus su /
NG0500:166: srog rgyu ba'i rlung nang nas phyir 'dren la stobs che /
NG0500:167: 'dus pa'i nam mkha' la phyir 'dren pa'i stobs che /
NG0500:168: nang du 'dren pa'i rlung gis phyi'i nam mkha' nas
NG0500:169: tshur 'dus thugs rig pa'i ye shes la thim mo
NG0500:170: // phar 'phros te 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' la thim pas /
NG0500:171: rnam par rlung zhon gyi dgongs pa zhes bya ba'o //
NG0500:172: tha ma ha zer nas phar la song ste /
NG0500:173: hu zer nas tshur ma 'dus pa'i tshe /
NG0500:174: rang gi mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes kyi mthongs zhes bya ba /
NG0500:175: 'od kha dog lnga bkra lam me snang ngo *//
NG0500:176: de ngo shes pas lcags la gser 'gyur rtsibatang ba 'am /
NG0500:177: mun khung du sgron me bteg pa ltar skad cig la yar gyi zang thal du grol lo //
NG0500:178: rigs kyi bu nang dbugs dang ma bral ba la
NG0500:179: / rdo rje sems dpa'i sna thag kyang bya /
NG0500:180: thugs rje rgyun gyi sna thag kyang bya ste /
NG0500:181: rang gi mig nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la /
NG0500:182: 'od kha dog lnga thag pa brkyang ba 'am //
NG0500:183: skas btsugs pa ltar snang ngo *//
NG0500:184: de'i dus su shes pa rang gi mig la gtad /
NG0500:185: mig thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad pa'i thag pa //
NG0500:186: 'od kha dog lnga la gtad pas / yar gyi zang thal la grol lo //
NG0500:187: yang na thugs rje'i 'od kha dog lnga shar ba'i tshe /
NG0500:188: ye shes lnga ldan gyi dkyil 'khor thob nas //
NG0500:189: dbugs ma chad pa la sangs rgya'o //
NG0500:192: gsang ba'i dbang rdzogs pa la ston cig ces bka' stsal to //
NG0500:194: sems ye shes su bstan pa'i le'u /
NG0500:195: a+thi+-i //  / dpe'i ngo sprod pa la gsum ste /
NG0500:196: shel dang nyi ma 'dra 'bag gsum / shel te
NG0500:197: rdo rje sems dpa'i me long yin / de'i phyir
NG0500:198: shel la mig bcug nas bltas pas /
NG0500:199: sangs rgyas kyi rang lus 'od kyi phung po la /
NG0500:200: 'od kha dog lnga phra la dwangs pa /
NG0500:202: rang bzhin gyis bkrag la nyam nga ba /
NG0500:203: kha dog lnga tse re re /
NG0500:205: de dag ye shes kyi snang ba yin no //
NG0500:206: de bzhin du rang gi rig pa'i rang gdangs 'od kha dog lnga ldan du yod do //
NG0500:207: rang gi rig pa'i rang 'od ngo shes par byas la /
NG0500:208: rang 'od la ma yengs par blta'o //
NG0500:209: de ni dag snang lta ba'i yang lta ba yin no //
NG0500:210: nyi ma la ngo sprod pa ni /
NG0500:211: mig gi steng du ther ma skab la blta'o //
NG0500:212: de la 'od zer mtshon cha'i rtse mo 'phro ba bzhin du 'byung ste //
NG0500:213: de nyi ma phyed la bltas pas 'khrul snang dag snang du 'char ro //
NG0500:215: zhing khams nyi ma la bzhag nas shel la bltas pas /
NG0500:216: longs sku kha mig rna ba can du 'char ro //
NG0500:217: de ji lta ba bzhin du bar do longs sku'i snang ba 'char tsa na /
NG0500:218: rang snang du ngo shes par de nyid du grol 'gro'o //
NG0500:219: dpe'i ngo sprod kyis don la phab bo //
NG0500:220: don gyi ngo sprod kyis don la thag chod /
NG0500:221: snang ba sna tshogs su 'char yang rang snang rang
NG0500:222: byung yin pas / tha chod rang la gyis shig / 'di phyi gnyis su med de /
NG0500:223: blo 'das rtsol med du grol lo //
NG0500:224: lan cig dus kyi tha ma la /
NG0500:225: skal ldan las 'phro can dang 'phrad nas 'di la longs spyod shog / ces gsungs so //
